summary: Hi there! I'm a software engineer (since 2008) who is interested in web development, high-load systems, data analysis, and a lot of other cool things, IT and open-source enthusiast. Today I’m focusing on Python and Golang development as a platform engineer, focusing on AWS tech stack and serverless solutions. On the other side, I'm looking for new great stuff from the JavaScript world(ReactJS, NodeJs, GatsbyJS, etc). Generally, I was starting my “professional” life as a dude that created HTML templates with tables and images. But today, I'm a dedicated solution engineer, platform architect, and product technical leader on our teams.

services.title: Software Engineering
services.description: A full-stack software engineer with over 16 years of experience. I have maintained, developed and launched multiple projects. Focusing on the secure, scalable and, potentially, serverless applications.

services.title: Rapid Prototyping
services.description: I do really focus on building secure and quality MVP first, instead of creating huge all-in-one application.

services.title: Technical Team Leadership
services.description: I'm a hands-on technical leader who has built software products from the ground up, run large engineering teams, and provided guidance at the executive and board level.

services.title: DevOps Engineering
services.description: I follow combination of cultural philosophies, and practices to help businesses automate their end-to-end software delivery pipeline with continuous integration, development, and collaboration, enabling rapid onboarding of applications.

services.title: Security Review
services.description: Let me try to be your trusted compliance and risk program advisor, and assist to Detect and respond to threats on your behalf.

services.title: Technical Product Management
services.description: I'm motivated by product success and business growth, not technology for technology's sake.
